response.answer_text: It reflects the capabilities of handling daily conditions and deal with them. If circumstances are in favour, things work as planned otherwise plans modified as per circumstances. It makes us weaker and stronger at the same time. It is up to us how we perceive it and drive the gear of life. Either you rule over it or they rule over you. As simple as that. Thanks & Regards,

It could totally mean the inability of achieving something inspite of putting all the heart to obtain it due to various dynamic parameters. Or , it could totally mean a reason given to you when someone is not able to do something for you. It's a possibility. At times, it means that the individual is not gutsy enough to choose the goal over and over again against all the hindrances he is facing. Easy said than done. Wishing is just not enough to achieve anything, we need to be ready to sacrifice… but when we sacrifice, we do achieve what we wished for… Kudos
